org.accada.epcis.queryclient
Class QueryClientGuiHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.epcis.queryclient.QueryClientGuiHelper

public class QueryClientGuiHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a Class to interface with the EPCIS query client. Also offers some helper methods to convert between different formats and for debug output.

Author:
David Gubler

                            javax.swing.JTextArea area)
Constructor. Takes the service endpoint address and a JTextArea used for debug output as arguments.

Parameters:
queryUrl - The URL of the query web service.
area - The text area where debug output will be written to.
